description: In a major development, the first National Logistics Corporation (NLC) truck, carrying 15 tonnes of mangoes, has reached Tashkent. The commodity was shipped in a reefer container to maintain its actual nutrition. The truck started its journey from Hyderabad and reached Tashkent within six days after covering a 2500-kilometre distance. Shipment of king of fruits […]
title: NLC’s first truck transports mangoes to Tashkent

description: RAWALPINDI – The Armed Forces of Pakistan have paid glowing tributes to the valiant personnel of the Police who have made the ultimate sacrifice in the line of duty. “Their unwavering dedication, unrelenting courage, and selfless sacrifice will be perpetually remembered and honoured”, reads the press release issued by the media wing of the armed […]
title: Armed forces pay glowing tributes to martyrs on Youm-e-Shuhada Police

description: PESHAWAR – Rain-wind/thunderstorms with isolated heavy falls are expected in Peshawar and parts of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa on Sunday night and Monday with occasional gaps. Per the Pakistan Meteorological Department (PMD), strong monsoon currents from the Arabian Sea and the Bay of Bengal penetrate most parts of Pakistan. A westerly wave also prevails over northern parts […]
title: Heavy rains expected in Peshawar, parts of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa

description: LAHORE – Intermittent monsoon rains with isolated heavy falls and gusty winds are predicted in Lahore and parts of Punjab on Sunday night and the next two days. title: Weather outlook of Lahore, Punjab; intermittent monsoon rains predicted

description: LAHORE – Lahore Chamber of Commerce and Industry President Kashif Anwar has expressed a resolve to continue supporting the development and uplift of the information technology sector in the country. title: Government urged to support IT sector for revival of economy

description: LAHORE – The University of Health Sciences (UHS) successfully conducted the Undergraduate Admission Test (UGAT) 2024 on Sunday. The exam was held at UHS and Punjab University examination centres, with 649 candidates competing for 170 available seats. The test began at 10:00 AM and concluded at 12:00 PM and consisted of 100 multiple-choice questions. Results […]
title: UHS conducts undergraduate admission test
